description: Jan Hein Hoogstad, known as Yeehaa, is a thought leader and author, focusing on internet fragmentation, decentralized systems, and digital ecosystems. He writes insightful articles and curates courses on related subjects.
blurb: Jan Hein Hoogstad, also known as Yeehaa, is a prolific writer and curator, specializing in the intersection of technology and society. His works explore the complex dynamics of the digital world.
